## How it works
Every pie is handmade with love, crafted with care, and baked using only high-quality Swiss ingredients.
Each pie is about 24 cm in diameter and serves 6–10 people — depending, of course, on how generous the slices are.

Orders can be picked up in Wallisellen. Because every pie and dessert is made from scratch — from resting the dough to letting the filling set — please allow at least 3 days’ notice for your order.

**Please note:** the order will be initialised only when payment has been done. For any inquiries, contact me directly at <a href="mailto:hello@flakypieshop.com">hello@flakypieshop.com</a>
